column4: Prudential plc, through its subsidiaries, provides life and health insurance, and asset management solutions to individuals in Asia and Africa. It offers savings and investments products; wealth, health, and protection products; and foreign exchange services. The company was founded in 1848 and is headquartered in Central, Hong Kong.
